Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Nightcap \Night"cap`\, n. 1. A cap worn in bed to protect the head, or in undress. [1913 Webster]
2. An alcoholic beverage drunk at bedtime. [Cant] --Wright. [1913 Webster]
nightcap n 1: an alcoholic drink taken at bedtime; often alcoholic 2: a cloth cap worn in bed 3: the final game of a double header
